radiographic_examinations.findings: There are streaky bibasilar opacities, also in the right hilar region, likely representing atelectasis. No focal consolidation. Blunting of the left costophrenic angle suggests a small pleural effusion. No pneumothorax. Heart size is normal.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: This has progressed compared to the prior study performed earlier on the same date.
